name: IBM XForce
description: This app implements various investigative actions on the IBM XForce device

actions.verbose: Runs the X-Force IP Report, IP Malware Report, and DNS Lookup.
Runs the X-Force URL Report and URL Malware Report (both of which accept domains), and DNS Lookup.
Runs the X-Force URL Report, URL Malware Report, and DNS Lookup.

actions.description: Returns malware report for a given hash.
